org.apache.nutch.hostdb

Class ResolverThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.nutch.hostdb.ResolverThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class ResolverThread
extends Object
implements Runnable
    Simple runnable that performs DNS lookup for a single host.
